${ModID}:Foreshadow.NAME: Foreshadow
${ModID}:Foreshadow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Startup: Gain a *Warcry.
${ModID}:Foreshadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Startup: Gain a *Warcry+.

${ModID}:Camera.NAME: Camera
${ModID}:Camera.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Next turn, draw X additional cards.

${ModID}:Action.NAME: Action!
${ModID}:Action.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${ModID}:BreakALeg.NAME: Break a Leg
${ModID}:BreakALeg.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable. NL Startup: Gain{@@}{!M!|1= [E] |2= [E] [E] |3= [E] [E] [E] |>3= !M! [E] }.

${ModID}:GrandOpening.NAME: Grand Opening
${ModID}:GrandOpening.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your discard pile. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:PlotArmor.NAME: Plot Armor
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! additional Block for each Innate and Startup card played this combat.

${ModID}:WellWrittenScript.NAME: Well-Written Script
${ModID}:WellWrittenScript.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! {@@}{!M!|@=card|>1=cards}.

${ModID}:Cross.NAME: Cross
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Crosses deal damage 1 more time this combat.

${ModID}:StartOver.NAME: Start Over
${ModID}:StartOver.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL cards into your draw pile. Draw !M! cards and trigger ALL Startup effects. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Starring.NAME: Starring
${ModID}:Starring.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! random Startup {@@}{!M!|@=card|>1=cards} and trigger it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StickySituation.NAME: Sticky Situation
${ModID}:StickySituation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add *Slime your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Startup: Heal !M! HP.
